maha ithihasagnyayage satahan (kri.pu. 100 pamana) saha una anuwarshika wartha wani aithihasika mulashrawala shan rajawanshayata perapawathi sthira likhitha madhyayak nomathi wu shiya rajawanshaya (kri.pu. 2070–1600 pamana) nam rajawanshaya pilibanda sandahan we.[3][4] sahasrayakata pera niyolithika yugaye kaha ganga saha yansi ganga nimna awata wiwidha sthana kendra karaganimin sanskruthiya godanagunath, kaha ganga china shishtacharaye thotilla lesa salakeyi.
